meanings.definition: In a splendid or impressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display lit up the night sky magnificently.
meanings.sent2: She sang magnificently at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to imitate the cat's graceful walk but ended up magnificently tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: The sun set magnificently behind the mountains, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The grand palace was magnificently decorated with intricate carvings and golden accents.

meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: She magnifically improved her grades after studying hard.
meanings.sent2: The team magnifically won the championship for the third year in a row.
meanings.sent3: The chef magnifically seasoned the dish with just the right amount of spices.
meanings.sent4: His speech magnifically moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent5: The artist magnifically captured the essence of the city in his painting.
